page.title: 18MUSLIM BELIEFS
page.content: The two Muslim sects believe that there is only one God and that Mohammed was his last prophet. The difference is that the Sunnies believe that Mohammed is not human and the Tabliqs believe that he was. The Tabliqs accept a preaching group called Jamaats. These men are ordinary people who travel from town to town preaching in the Mosque. when present the Jamaat stays, sleeping and eating in the Mosque. The Sunnies do not agree with this. The Tabliqs believe that, as the Prophet Mohammed preached, everybody should preach. The Sunnies reserve the act of Preaching to 'saints'who have special religious power and are not ordinary people. The Tabliqs do not believe that there are saints alive today. Both sects believe that only God can perform miracles and that all miracles had been performed by the end of Mohammed's life on earth.
